data.name: Dismissed
data.value: Okay! Let me know if you need anything. üíï

data.name: AskForDescriptionMessage
data.value: Could you give me an ad or **description** of the venue? Something for players to read when they click on your venue. `(example: @Veni Ki Veni's Mainframe is the premiere party location...)`

data.value: Could you give me an ad or **description** of the venue? Something for players to read when they click on your venue.

data.name: AskIfHasSchedule
data.value: Oki! Do you have a weekly opening schedule?

data.name: DescriptionHasWeeklySchedule
data.value: Yes, our openings are every week.

data.name: DescriptionHasBiweeklySchedule
data.value: Yes, our openings are every 2 weeks

data.name: DescriptionHasNoSchedule
data.value: No, we don't have a set schedule

data.name: NoPermission
data.value: Aaaah. You'll need to [create a ticket](https://discord.com/channels/942536163959406632/1188579990271434883) and ask staff in the FFXIV Venues discord to change this part of your venue information. üòä

data.name: OpeningTooLong
data.value: Aaaah, that's a long opening. üò¢ Please only gives hours your are **actively present or staffed**. If you are indeed open and staffed longer than 7 hours please [create a ticket](https://discord.com/channels/942536163959406632/1188579990271434883) in the FFXIV Venues discord to extend for longer hours.

data.name: DescriptionHasMonthlySchedule
data.value: Yes, our openings are on a particular day of every month.

data.name: OptionWeekly
data.value: Weekly

data.name: OptionBiweekly
data.value: Biweekly

data.name: OptionMonthly
data.value: Monthly

data.name: OptionNoSchedule
data.value: No schedule
